Title: Simple Silverlight Media Player (SSMP)
Description: This is a really basic media player written in Silverlight and meant to be used by folks on their blogs.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
As the name suggests, this is a simple, reusable media player written in Silverlight. The player can be used within a standard website, a WordPress blog, a SharePoint site, etc., etc.

You can read more about this project on my blog here.
